Posting a Task with a photo

TaskRabbit allows the posting of a photo in the PNG, JPEG or GIF format with a size limit of 2MB. Adding a descriptive photo to a Task greatly increases the assignment.

POST /api/v1/tasks

task: name: Walk my dog named_price: 15 city_id: 3 uploaded_photos_attributes: "1": image: BINARY_FILE_GETS_REPLACED_HERE

Simplified Response

At this time, the response does not confirm the image upload.

json { "id":9221, "name":"Walk my dog", "named_price": 15, "state":"opened", "city":{ "id":3, "name":"SF Bay Area" }, "links":{ "get":"/api/v1/tasks/9221" } }
